additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: INGREDIENTS: Aqua, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Glyceryl Stearate, Heptyl Undecylenate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glycerin, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, Potassium Cetyl Phosphate, Benzyl Alcohol, Citric Acid, Avena Sativa (Oat) Meal Extract, Xanthan Gum, Parfum, Panthenol (Vitamin B5), Potassium Sorbate, Triticum Vulgare (Wheat) Germ Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E), Cannabis Sativa (Hemp) Seed Oil, Davidsonia Jerseyana Fruit Extract, Citrus Aurantium Amara (Neroli) Flower Oil, Salvia Sclarea (Clary Sage) Oil, Eremophila Longifolia (Emu Bush) Leaf Extract, Triethanolamine.

description: An aromatic blend of clary sage and neroli essential oils, complemented with vitamin E, B5 and shea butter to nourish & protect. NO Parabens NO Silicones NO EDTA NO Mineral Oil NO Propylene Glycol NO Animal Derivatives NO Artificial Colours NO Artificial Fragrances Cruelty Free Natural Ingredients
name: Neroli & Clary Sage Hand Cream
